segments.text: I'm going to have to do some shopping today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah ? What do you need to go shopping for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to find a new bedroom set .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know where you're going to find your bedroom set ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's no particular place that you want to look at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know where to go to find a nice bedroom set .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can tell you where I got mine , if you'd like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are the bedroom sets at IKEA affordable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really , but you're paying for quality .
segments.speaker: S2
